options.content:
See Individual Flows for $Organization See Science Data for $Organization

Flow Data by Organization
  • This dashboard shows top flows with the specified organization as the source or destination.
  • Select an organization from the list above, or start typing the name of the specific organization, the dropdown menu only shows 1000 results at a time.
  • Click on the name of an institution in one of the tables to go to the individual flows dashboard for that institution and the one selected for the page.
  • Please note that rate will be zero if only one sampled flow was detected.
  • All times are displayed in browser local time.

targets.query: meta.src_organization:$Organization AND meta.sensor_id:$Sensors AND meta.src_resource_name:$resource AND meta.dst.community:$community AND ((!(_exists_:meta.country_scope)) OR meta.country_scope:$country_scope)  AND ((!(_exists_:meta.is_network_testing)) OR meta.is_network_testing:no OR meta.is_network_testing:$is_net_test)

panels.title: Total Number of Flows Distributed Over Selected Time Period
